name: Subway Stickman Skater
description:
Take your stickman skater on an adventure through the subway!

Subway Stickman Skater is a simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. Help your stickman collect coins and avoid the subway station items that are in his way!

How long can you stay upright on your board? Think you got what it takes to rack up those coins? The game will start moving faster and faster, so watch out for those obstacles!

Collect enough coins and you can unlock Ninja Stickman and Jetpack Stickman for even more fun!


*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect coins to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch


Download Subway Stickman Skater right now!
